updates.text: [NSL] Free bus service between Sembawang and YioChuKang has ceased.
[NSL] FAULT CLEARED: Train services from #Woodlands  to #YioChuKang are now running normally now.
Fault cleared. Expect longer travel time from #Woodlands towards #YioChuKang. Free bus available. Our engineers are rectifying fault now.
[NSL] UPDATE: Fault is cleared. Expect 15mins additional travelling time from #Woodlands to #YioChuKang. Free bus is available
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #Sembawang towards #YioChuKang has resumed now.
[NSL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #Sembawang to #YioChuKang towards MarinaBay due to track fault.
